get.summary: Get detail of an asset location

get.description: Returns a paginated list of users including their roles and permissions.

post.description: Creates a new user and assigns roles and permissions.

get.description: Returns a single user's data including their roles and permissions.

put.description: Updates an existing user's data, roles, and permissions.

delete.description: Deletes a specific user from the database.

tags.name: Users (API)
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing Users with Roles and Permissions
